entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Problem with interception StandardOutput in Linux #73923
  • Resolve ILVerify assembly references from `.deps.json`. #73922
  • [arm64] Unexpected performance degradation for Vector128<short> #73921
    7.0.0
  • Ubuntu Server 20.04 SO_REUSEPORT throws System.Net.Sockets.SocketException (95): Operation not supported #73920
  • Maui App after update Microsoft.AspNetCore.SignalR.Client to 6.0.8 release build crash without error message #73916
  • Configuration binding swallows the conversion exception #73915
  • "hotReloadEnabled": false does not work #73909

Closed

  • Parsing NumberStyles.HexNumber with "0x" prefix fails #73924
  • [NativeAOT] Stress crash in ThreadStore::DetachCurrentThread #73116
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Tests failing to build with trimming #73901
    8.0.0
  • Developers need faster interop between JavaScript and C# to be able to port large apps to webassembly #44330
    7.0.0
  • System.Net.WebProxy Bypass regex list reconstructed for every call to IsBypassed #73703
    Future
  • Performance has doubled since a couple of days ago. #73891
  • AssemblyLoadContext issue, needs better documentation or default behavior for AssemblyLoadContext #73900
    Future
  • Missing authorship information on 70 - 80 commits authored by @4creators #69968
    Future
  • Test failure: WasmTestOnBrowser-subtlecrypto-System.Security.Cryptography.Tests #73872
    8.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] Hook up webworker console to xharness websockets #72606
    8.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] Don't hardcode PTHREAD_POOL_SIZE #68397
    8.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] Publish `dotnet.worker.js` #68509
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] warning WASM0001: Could not get pinvoke, or callbacks for method 'EnumUILanguages' because 'Parsing function pointer types in signatures is not supported.' #73880

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: Skip unnecessary binary VN folding checks #73919
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [IGNORE][wasm] debugging a test #73917
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Add generation of structured object file dumps #73913
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Filter out Tailscale from LinkLocal address list #73911
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Use {Last}IndexOfAnyExcept in RegexCompiler and source generator #73910
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0

Merged

  • [NativeAOT] Fix a stress crash in thread detach at process shutdown. #73912
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Safer state handling in distributed transactions #73918
    area-System.Transactions
  • Clean up temp directory methods in System.ComponentModel.Composition tests #73857
    area-System.ComponentModel.Composition
  • System.Net.WebProxy Bypass regex list optimization #73803
    area-System.Net, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Copy the string instead of returning different pointers #73795
    area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix and simplify __has_builtin conditions #73905
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Misc tests related fixes #73884
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] Use asset loading for dotnet.worker.js; update WasmAppBuilder #73697
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Fix runtime pack aliasing #73885
    area-Infrastructure-mono

Updated

  • Repoint urls in docs #73766
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Unify MaxResponseHeadersLength calculations #73907
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] cleanup testing and host support in templatest and tests #73785
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Improve XmlDictionaryWriter UTF8 encoding performance #73336
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Bump Newtonsoft.Json from 12.0.3 to 13.0.1 in /src/libraries/Common/tests/System/Net/Prerequisites/NetCoreServer #71180
    area-System.Net, community-contribution, .NET
  • Add tests and improve binary XmlDictionaryReader performance #73332
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Improve Binary Xml (XmlDictionaryWriter) performance #71478
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Product dependencies in Versions.props must be on the latest patch version for libraries dependencies #73871
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • [API Implementation]: Expose general purpose Crc32 APIs #61558
    area-System.Numerics, blocked, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Vectorize LastIndexOf and LastIndexOfAnyExcept without code duplication #73768
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Memory
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix "command is not pending" #72953
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Avoid unused NetEventSource code #73868
    area-System.Net
  • avoid allocation of SafeFreeSslCredentials and SafeDeleteSslContext on Linux #69527
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux
  • JIT: extend forward sub to local fields #73719
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Clean up AOT publish process #73416
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Unmanaged structs are considered blittable if module has `DisableRuntimeMarshallingAttribute` #73310
    arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono, 7.0.0
  • Add initial support for Freebsd.arm64 #71486
    os-freebsd, area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add extra NativeAOT test legs #73547
    area-Infrastructure
  • [NativeAot] Enable a couple more libs tests #73756
    area-System.Net
  • fix handling of client cert on macOS #73574
    area-System.Net.Security, os-mac-os-x
  • Add JSON Int128 and UInt128 support #73892
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • "Unresolved external symbol" when trying to P/Invoke exported function from separate library #1959

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix chained unwind info for stack alloc scenarios #1958

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Dotnet new react template using function components #27161
  • Dotnet new react template using typescript for client app #27160
  • The 3.1 and 5.0 SDKs do not support musl/Alpine Linux anymore #27156
  • .NET 6 Test Project with CopyLocalLockFileAssemblies = false fails running tests #27154
  • Cannot control verbosity with `dotnet tool restore --verbosity` #27153

PullRequests

Created

  • Corresponding PublishAOT changes to match the runtime cleanup changes #27159
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Clean-up rules (styling) and make CompatDifference a readonly struct #27155
    Area-ApiCompat

Updated

  • Get PublishRelease and PackRelease working in .*proj, Solutions #26808
    Area-Infrastructure, 7.0.1xx

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SourceGenerator is too slow #63397
  • "Error CS8034: failed to load Analyzer", if analyzer is packed with native dependencies #63396
  • The compiler broke recently #63395
  • Error list is stuck #63394

Closed

  • Add argument name refactoring on commented first arg seems to duplicate comment #63361
  • `args` not offered in top-level statements #63393

PullRequests

Created

  • Pass SolutionServices in more places #63398
    Area-IDE
  • Share a DiagnosticAnalyzerInfoCache between DiagnosticAnalyzerService and DiagnosticAnalyzerServiceQuickInfoProvider #63392
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #63391
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to features/lambda-default-parameters #63387
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Simplify TypeKind condition #63379
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge main to features/ConvertToRecord #63390
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/editorconfig_lsp #63389
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/DocumentOutline #63388
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Render exception documentation texts. #56162
    Area-IDE
  • Use existing Program class declaration in "Convert to 'Program.Main'" refactoring when possible #63276
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Do not return awaited void task in "Introduce local" refactoring #63385
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Classify 'u8' in Utf8 string literals as keyword #63381
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add return types to SymbolKey creation and resolution #63304
    Area-IDE
  • Restore nullable warnings for unset required members from base types #63286
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Fixes EnC slot mapping for certain kinds of synthesized variables lifted to state machine fields #63295
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • High memory usage when I run `dotnet workload install wasm-tools` #43280
  • Do I need some fixing ? #43279
  • Use $HOME/.config/Microsoft/ASP.NET instead of $HOME/.aspnet in unix-like environments #43278
  • Improve code using pattern matching #43277
  • src/security/samples/StaticFilesAuth always not working #43274
  • Figure out why FullChain test fails on OSX #43273
    7.0-rc2
  • Response Caching should have a way of clearing a specific resource from the cache #43272
  • Response Caching should ignore the host part of the request #43271

Closed

  • Localized views with Razor Pages #40186
    Discussions
  • Blazor Wasm Transient Disposable registrations of AuthorizationMessageHandler #43234
  • Blazor support for root level do while loop in C# code #43264
  • [Question] When _transformCache(HashSet<ClaimsPrincipal>) in AuthenticationService will really help ? #42852
    Discussions
  • The type or namespace name does not exist in the namespace '__Blazor #42129
    Discussions
  • Support specifying a full certificate chain in HttpsConnectionAdapterOptions #21513
    7.0-rc1

PullRequests

Created

  • Default to zero byte reads when we use PipeReader.Create #43276

Merged

  • Kestrel: Support full cert chain #41944
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc1
  • Add credscan stuff #43275
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-rc1

Updated

  • HTTP/3: Test abort at end of request #43183
    area-runtime
  • Add LF request line terminator option #43202
    area-runtime
  • Only create context if an event is set #43211
    area-security, community-contribution
  • Avoid failed authN log when the endpoint has IAllowAnonymous metadata #43212
    breaking-change, area-security, community-contribution
  • Add support for running final conventions during build #43225
    area-web-frameworks
  • [Blazor] Add a comment to help enable the crypto worker #43239
    area-mvc
  • Update branding to 7.0.0-rc2 #43240
    area-infrastructure
  • Retry BidirectionalStream_ServerReadsDataAndCompletes_GracefullyClosed #43245
    area-infrastructure
  • Cancel client results after a default timeout (and fix cancel closing connection) #43249
    area-signalr
  • Remove QuicTransportOptions.IdleTimeout #43250
    area-runtime
  • Expose entire EndpointBuilder to filter factories #43255
  • Improve vary-by rules #43257
  • Kestrel sample: only enable delayed client cert negotiation on non-macOS #43263
    area-runtime
  • Perf-up the AuthZ! #43268
    community-contribution
  • Reuse failed auth results in AuthN #43269
    area-security, community-contribution
  • Store and reuse client certificate task #43270
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Cache effective policy in endpoint metadata #43124
    area-security, api-suggestion

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Enhancement] (WebView) - Expose C# classes in JS #9424
  • SwipeView in CollectionView Faults on Windows #9423
  • x:Array as resource with key crashes app on device launch #9422
  • MenuBar not shown on Andoid #9421
  • [MAC/iOS] Contents are blurred with scaling #9420
  • The command interface for buttons - Command.ChangeCanExecute() #9419
  • Java.Lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException: 'setSpan ( ... ) ends beyond length #9418
  • MAUI App build/compiles and runs fine on Windows but fails to build/compile for Android: com.android.tools.r8.CompilationFailedException #9413

Closed

  • Brand new install of Visual Studio 2022 17.3 with Maui Workload on MAC M1 fails #9328
  • Get device serial number #9395

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.ExecutionEngineException iOS Release #28710
  • Query: EntityProjectionExpression.MakeNullable should only create new instance if any of the components changed it's nullability #28707

Closed

  • Reverse-engineer composite keys to PrimaryKeyAttribute when using data annotations #27637
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow users to always use transactions with SaveChanges #28711
  • API review items #28709
  • Allow parameterless constructor in addition to required constructor when using context pooling #28708

Merged

  • Reverse-engineer composite keys to PrimaryKeyAttribute when using data annotations #28705

Updated

  • Json Columns query work #28171
  • Stop scaffolding DbSet initializers #28684
  • Implement SqlQuery<T> #28665
